BrowsecompFindAppTaskEvalUI1: Among Audio Recorder, Draw, Vlc, Pro Expense, Broccoli, MediLog and Markor,some apps support changing the interface language and the theme color.Among the apps that meet the requirements, find the one that offers more than 50 supported languages in its in-app settings. Tell me the name of the APP.
BrowsecompFindAppTaskEvalUI1CHS: 在 Audio Recorder、Draw、Vlc、Pro Expense、Broccoli、MediLog 和 Markor 之中，有些应用支持更改界面语言和主题颜色。请在满足条件的APP中找出在其应用内的设置中提供超过 50 种支持的语言的应用。告诉我该应用的名称。
BrowsecompFindAppTaskEvalUI1Variation: From the list of Audio Recorder, Draw, Vlc, Pro Expense, Broccoli, MediLog and Markor, certain applications allow users to modify both the UI language and the color scheme. Identify the application that provides support for over 50 languages within its settings or preferences menu. Report the name of that APP.
BrowsecompFindAppTaskEvalUI2: Among VLC, Gallery, Photos, Draw, Markor, Pro Expense, Audio Recorder and Broccoli, find an app that can play recordings or videos.Which one offers more than 6 theme color options in its in-app settings. Tell me the name of the APP.
BrowsecompFindAppTaskEvalUI3: Among Joplin, Markor, Canlendar, Files, Broccoli, MediLog and Vlc, there is an information-management app in which you can create individual information items. Each item can be favorited by tapping the heart-shaped button in the upper-right corner, and it can also be exported to PDF. Explore the device, identify this app, and tell me its name.
BrowsecompFindAppandAskInfo1: I need to find an app among VLC, Retro Music, Joplin, Expense, Markor and Files. From its main screen, check the bottom navigation bar: it must have at least 4 buttons. Somewhere on the same main screen there is a magnifying-glass icon button. The app’s Theme settings offer more than 4 choices. Identify this app and tell me the name of its Project Team.
BrowsecompFindAppandRelatedAppandAskInfo: Among Joplin, Files, Broccoli, VLC, Markor, Calender and MediLog, there is an information-management app. When you create a new information item and start editing its content, a button (three horizontal dots) appears in the bottom button bar. Tapping it reveals additional editing tools. Explore the device to locate this app and tell me its name.
BrowsecompFindImage: There are some images located at sdk_gphone_x86_64. I want to find an image related to ball sports. Tell me the name of the ball sports.
BrowsecompFindVideo: There are some videos located at sdk_gphone_x86_64.I need to find a video that meets the following requirements: 1. It contains animals. 2. It includes at least two animals. Tell me the name of the video including the file extension.
BrowsecompOpenAppTaskEvalUICompCreate1: Among Files, Joplin, Tasks, Broccoli, Pro Expense, Markor and Calender, open an app whose icon contains blue color. After launching, the UI should not have any search bar or search button at the top. Find the APP and tell me its name.
BrowsecompOpenAppTaskEvalUICompCreate2: Among Audio Recorder, Markor, Broccoli, MediLog, Pro Expense, Vlc, and Joplin,open an app whose icon uses no more than two colors. After launching, the UI should display a "+" symbol at the bottom-right corner. Among such apps, select the one that requires the fewest input fields or rows after tapping "+". Find the APP and tell me its name.
BrowsecompVlcFindVlcAPP1: Among the apps Markor, Joplin, Tasks, Broccoli, Simple Calendar Pro, VLC, and Audio Recorder, identify the one whose settings screen contains four exclamation-mark buttons, each used to explain the meaning of the setting it is next to. Provide the app name.
BrowsecompVlcFindVlcAPP1CHS: 在 Markor、Joplin、Tasks、Broccoli、Simple Calendar Pro、VLC 和 Audio Recorder 这些应用中，找出设置界面包含四个感叹号按钮的那个应用；每个按钮用于解释其旁边的设置含义。请告诉我该应用的名称。
BrowsecompVlcFindVlcAPP1Variation: From the apps Markor, Joplin, Tasks, Broccoli, Simple Calendar Pro, VLC, and Audio Recorder, determine which one has a Settings screen containing four exclamation mark buttons, each explaining the adjacent setting. Give the name of that app.
FuncAssistExpenseExplainAllFunctionality: What can I do with pro expense? Explore this APP and tell me all its functionalities.
FuncAssistExpenseExplainOneFunctionality:
Explore pro expense and tell me how to add a new expense.
Specifically, identify all available fields, options, and settings 
that can be configured when creating an expense.

请深入探索 pro expense，并尽可能详细地告诉我如何新增一笔支出。
请具体列出创建支出时可填写的所有字段、可配置选项与设置项。

Open pro expense and walk me through adding a new expense in the most exhaustive way possible.
Enumerate every field, option, and setting that appears while creating an expense.

GSATimingAudioRecorderPauseAudioRecordin: Record an audio clip in Audio Recorder, pausing at 14-16 seconds (do not save).
GSATimingAudioRecorderRecordAudioTime: Record a 11-13-second audio clip in Audio Recorder and save it with the name "note".

GSATimingAudioRecorderRecordAudioTimeENG: Open the Audio Recorder app, capture an audio segment lasting between 13 and 15 seconds, and then save it.
GSATimingTomatoLongBreakTime: Launch the Tomato app, let the long-break timer run for about 19-21 seconds, then hit Pause.
GSATrackingBlacklistBlockAndSendSms: 8 calls will be coming in. Monitor the incoming-call screen continuously. If the caller's number is in the blacklist ['5551921565', '5556075905', '5555142871', '5552064577', '5559486837', '5555353718'], decline the call immediately. Otherwise, decline it and immediately follow up with an SMS that says: 'I am tied up right now—will get back to you later.'
GSATrackingPhoneCall: 8 calls will be coming in—decline all of them. For any number that has called at least three times, append that number to the file ‘phonenumber.md’ in Markor.
GSATrackingPhoneCallCHS: 接下来会收到 8 通电话——全部拒接。对于任何号码，只要它在本次测试中累计拨打过至少 3 次，就把该号码追加到 Markor 的 ‘phonenumber.md’ 文件里。
GSATrackingPhoneCallENGVariation: You will receive 8 incoming calls—reject all of them. For each number that has called at least 3 times, add that number to the 'phonenumber.md' file in Markor.
GSATrackingSMSHandleIncomingKeywords: Handle the following 8 SMS. Every time a new SMS arrives, read its body and check if it contains any of the keywords ['urgent', 'meeting', 'password', 'alert'] (case-insensitive). Record the content of the messages with keywords in message.md in Markor. Format each line as 'Contact Name: Message' and record them in the order they arrive.
GSATrackingSimpleSmsHandleFiveIncomingHa: Handle the next 5 incoming SMS messages according to these rules: Reply to legitimate personal messages; delete any advertisement or spam messages; never send out sensitive or private information; when an OTP / verification code arrives, append only the code to the file OTP.md in Markor.
GSATrackingSimpleSmsNotifyDelivery: Monitor incoming SMS to see if my food delivery has arrived. As soon as it does, send a new SMS to my roommate Luka Li saying 'Food's here!'
GSATrackingWhitelistCallAnswer: 8 calls will be coming in. Decline all of them. After that, report me the numbers in the following ['5554206927', '5555055426', '5556859747', '5556428429', '5556700970', '5551329269', '5551535845', '5552154559', '5551313043', '5558949677'] that called you, in the order they called, separated by commas. For example: 5551234567,5559876543,5555555555
